Anyway since this is the final part (as we got basically a title drop at the end), the main idea is nice. Pretty enjoyable read.

What the hell man..
I came here to satisfy my shameless lustful side but all I got was a sharp pain in my heart.

I read all three parts ( Part 3 is not translated, but reading when it gets translated will just connect more dots to heartache I bet ). If the Author makes a part 5, I might be scared to read it because at this point, it can either have a good ending or it just continues with that painful story.
ah, well...
Man this series... You get attached to these characters and get really sad at that ending even though you've only known them for a few doujins. I must applaud and say amazing work.
This is worse than Emergence. Story sucked ass.
Damn, this is just too sad, alexa play oniichan daisuki at maximum volume....

Also, this is actually the 4th part, not 3rd. Order is:
1. Imouto wa Genius = My Little Sister Is a Genius
2. Imouto wa Tashizan ga Dekinai = My Little Sister Can't Do Basic Addition
3. Imouto wa Kanji ga Yomenai  = (Not translated in English yet)
4. Imouto wa Kakezan ga Dekiru = My Sister Can Multiply (This one)

Damn, so she really did get brain damage... I was hoping that the twist was that she pretended to be stupid to be with her brother but permanently losing herself is just too depressing.... ICHIHAYA YOU DID IT AGAIN YOU BASTARD!!!

Whats confusing is the first two pages. In it, she seems to have regained her intellect. The MC questions why she calls him "Onii-chan" even though after the incident, she only calls him that (could be translation error). So is this a memory of the past? If so, judging by her reaction, they must have had sex pretty often before she fell, but that wouldnt make sense since they seem to have a stable relationship. Theres also the very mysterious "Ever since i opened the door to her room... i havent gotten an email..." on the same page. Judging by it, it seems like this happened before the video got sent since in the beginning, the MC is working hard to write his OWN stories. So, given all these clues, is this an event that happens in the future? Does she regain herself or was she faking it? Theres also the hints in the previous chapters where shes constantly tired, perhaps she was actually writing the novel after sex everynight (video being the only thing she made before). I dont get it.
Big Sad :(
@Hikai181050 Actually, there are 3 parts,  My little sister is a genius/ can't do basic adition / and this.

i did not care at the beginning (imouto is a genius), the second half (imouto cannot do basic addition) i was like "she is pretending that she got dumy", but the last half (this one), i was like "man, i cannot fap this, this is too depressing to fap" i almost cried, really... for me it was semi-dark ending but with a good plot... so... it was a nice story.
